__e: Righteous men will not allow backbiting in their presence. They hate sin in themselves, and they hate it in others. They must correct wrongdoing, and they want to protect the character of all men. If they hear backbiting, they will end it with an angry look of disapproval, for it is a duty of godly men to warn the unruly (I Thess 5:14). If the guilty party is under their authority, they will correct it or cast the offender out (Ps 101:4-6).
The unredeemed are redeeming theirselves... and the new Jesus is at hand.
